A short vindication of the constitution of the Church of England endeavouring to prevent all future quarrels and discontents. Grice, Thomas, b. 1655 or 6.
[7], 25 p.
Printed for R.C., and are to be sold by Randal Taylor, London : 1689.
Dedication signed: Thomas Grice. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
